lyrics.text: I am on my way, relying on your promise, my eyes are looking up to your glory
I trust you and I believe in the power of your love, You are my lord who keeps his promises
As long as I have you in my life, my voices raises and my chanting becomes louder
My soul says this is my lord, the one who is keeping me safe in his loving embrace
You my lord are veracious, you keep your promises
Even if the crosswind is so strong, my trust is in you to control it
Even if I get into the hardest of ordeals, you lord, with your grace will see me through it to the vastness of your mercy*
Sometimes I think, this must be the end and feel so powerless and speechless but then again, you are always there for me to give me a helping hand and bring me back to life.
Now matter how hurt I become from the harsh experiences I go through in life, the tenderness of your touch makes me joyful.
The night of despair is so short and limited, it will face its end no matter how big the sadness becomes. It will surely end as I remain waiting for a new dawn, upon which, your promises come true

englishTranslations.title: I am on my way, relying on your promise

lyrics.text: When facing inexplicable things, when facing an unbearable pain, when facing a God that seems to be absent, when every sign seems to raise a question,
What can I say back? How can I fight it? I have no other support besides what He said...
He said: "Do not fear, my child", and whoever said that1 has never left me, not even once.
When facing an unfriendly time, when facing bitter and heavy years, when people are like wolves, when justice is influenced by money,
What can I say back? How can I fight it? I have no other support besides what He said...
He said: "Don not fear, my child", and whoever said that has never left me, not even once.
When people only care about mundane things, when egos get tempted with lust, when the Snake2 takes from the Book3 wrong verses, it's a corruption.4
What can I say back? How can I fight it? I have no other besides than what He said...
He said: "Do not fear, my child", and whoever said that has never left me, not even once.
